desc: 测试更新出差本表，不含子表的案例
name: UpdateTravelSelfSimple
desc: 测试点：简单的更新，不含子表

oqls.desc: 根据记录ID更新出差记录
oqls.name: UpdateTravelById
oqls.oql: update Travel set applyName = '测试申请单1（变更）' where applyId = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'
oqls.sql: update TRAVEL set APPLY_NAME = '测试申请单1（变更）' where APPLY_ID = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'

oqls.desc: 根据记录ID更新出差记录（带变量）
oqls.name: UpdateTravelByIdVars
oqls.oql: update Travel set applyName = #{applyName} where applyId = #{applyId}
oqls.sql: update TRAVEL set APPLY_NAME = #{applyName} where APPLY_ID = #{applyId}
